snippet.title: The Eyes of Ara - Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Eyes of Ara invites you to escape to another place. Become enthralled in a stunning Adventure-Puzzle game set in a gorgeous 3D environment as you weave your way through a tale of mystery and discovery. Solve elaborate puzzles, locate lost treasures, and discover stories of those who once called the castle home.

Available now for Windows and Mac!
Get it on Steam and Humble, visit www.eyesofara.com

Discover The Eyes of Ara online at www.eyesofara.com

Follow the game on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/100stonesinteractive
Twitter: https://twitter.com/100Stonesgames
